statements: UPDATE game_assets SET asset_name = 'New Name' WHERE asset_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';

UPDATE asset_metadata SET metadata_key = 'Updated Key', metadata_value = 'Updated Value' WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001';

UPDATE game_assets SET asset_name = 'New Asset Name' WHERE asset_id = 1;
UPDATE images SET image_name = 'New Image Name', image_size = 1024, image_resolution = '1920x1080' WHERE image_id = 2;

UPDATE videos SET video_duration = '00:03:45', video_quality = 'Full HD' WHERE video_id = 5;
